word:
[John 1:1-4, 9-11, quoted.] 
     In Christ the shadow reached its substance, the type its antitype. Well might Caiaphas rend his clothes in horror for himself and for the nation; for they were separating themselves from God, and were fast becoming 


                                    -392- 

a people unchurched by Jehovah. Surely the candlestick was being removed out of its place.
